attributes.action: Make Monday 12th July 2021 a bank holiday
attributes.additional_details: After a difficult year and an intense Euro 2020, we deserve an extra day of rest whether it's coming home or not.
attributes.background: We call on the government to make 12th July 2021 a bank holiday.

rejection.details: It can take up to 7 days for us to check your petition, so unfortunately it's now too late for your petition.
